content: the correct order to purl read chart from right to left starting with row 1 the 1st stitch and knit the 2nd stitch p purl through the back loop n knit 1 stitch through back loop ab/ cable 1 over 1 right…slip 1 to cn hold in back k1tbl p1 from cn c/d cable 1 over 1 left…slip 1 to cn hold in front p1 revision 6/24/2013 k1tbl from cn
